error.failedUserCreation: Something wrong with the user creation.
error.emailAlreadySent: The e-mail has already been sent. You can also check the 'spam' directory.

error.failedGoogle: Failed to receive data from Google.
error.alreadyInBorrow: You can't send a request for this book now, it's probably already been lent.

email.passwordBody:
Hi,

Password modification link: {{ link }}.

Thanks! The BookSwap team
email.verifyBody:
Hi,

You registered an account on BookSwap, before being able to use your account you need to verify that this is your email address by clicking here: {{ link }}.

Thanks! The BookSwap team
